trans-unit.source: Provides methods for creating graphics buffers that can be used for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi per la creazione di buffer di grafica che può essere utilizzato per il doppio buffer.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsContext class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: La classe BufferedGraphicsContext consente di implementare il doppio buffer personalizzato per le immagini.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Le immagini che utilizzano il doppio buffer possono ridurre o eliminare lo sfarfallio causato da ridisegnare una superficie di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il modo più semplice per utilizzare il doppio buffer consiste nell'impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>controllare il flag di stile per un controllo mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control styles flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>flag stili del controllo per un controllo reindirizza tutto il disegno del controllo mediante un buffer grafico predefinito, senza richiedere alcun codice aggiuntivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Questo flag è impostato su `true` per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsContext class provides methods for creating and configuring a graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: La classe BufferedGraphicsContext fornisce metodi per la creazione e configurazione di un buffer grafico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, which is a wrapper for a graphics buffer that also provides methods you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metodo crea un <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, che è un wrapper per un buffer di grafica che fornisce inoltre metodi che è possibile utilizzare per scrivere nel buffer ed eseguire il rendering del contenuto in un dispositivo di output.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the BufferedGraphicsContext for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare il BufferedGraphicsContext per il dominio applicazione corrente da statico <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can create a dedicated BufferedGraphicsContext using the constructor, but for most applications the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property will be sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Per applicazioni grafiche quali animazione, è possibile creare un BufferedGraphicsContext dedicato utilizzando il costruttore, ma per la maggior parte delle applicazioni di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà saranno sufficiente.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on drawing buffered graphics and custom buffering implementations, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla creazione di grafica memorizzata nel buffer e implementazioni di buffer personalizzate, vedere [grafica a doppio buffer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [procedura: gestire manualmente le immagini memorizzate nel buffer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can sometimes improve performance by using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> instead of the default instance provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.
trans-unit.target: Per applicazioni grafiche quali animazione, è talvolta possono migliorare le prestazioni utilizzando un dedicato <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>invece dell'istanza predefinita fornita da <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create and manage graphics buffers individually.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo è possibile creare e gestire i buffer grafici.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should always call <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A> when you finish using a dedicated <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > È sempre necessario chiamare <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>al termine dell'utilizzo del <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> dedicato</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about dedicated graphics buffers, see [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui buffer di grafica dedicata, vedere [procedura: gestire manualmente le immagini memorizzate nel buffer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un buffer di grafica della dimensione specificata utilizzando il formato pixel specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Allocate method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama il metodo di allocazione con un rettangolo la cui dimensione supera il valore del <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>proprietà, un temporaneo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>viene creata per allocare il buffer e fornire un contesto temporaneo per il buffer.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the Allocate method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>è diverso dal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>per l'applicazione di dominio e viene eliminato automaticamente quando il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>restituito per l'allocazione di metodo è stato eliminato.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to match the pixel format for the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> in base al formato di pixel per il nuovo buffer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che indica la dimensione del buffer da creare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> che può essere utilizzato per creare un buffer di dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: Creates a graphics buffer of the specified size using the pixel format of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un buffer di grafica della dimensione specificata utilizzando il formato pixel specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method with a rectangle whose size exceeds the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> property, a temporary <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is created to allocate the buffer and provide a temporary context for the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metodo con un rettangolo le cui dimensioni superano il valore del <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A>proprietà, un temporaneo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>viene creata per allocare il buffer e fornire un contesto temporaneo per il buffer.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.MaximumBuffer%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> is distinct from the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the application domain and it is disposed automatically when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>è diverso da quello di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>per l'applicazione di dominio e viene eliminato automaticamente quando il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>restituito dal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metodo è stato eliminato.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> to a device context to match the pixel format of the new buffer to.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IntPtr>a un contesto di dispositivo in base al formato di pixel del nuovo buffer.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> indicating the size of the buffer to create.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che indica la dimensione del buffer da creare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> that can be used to draw to a buffer of the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> che può essere utilizzato per creare un buffer di dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>occupata.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama il <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the current graphics buffer, if a buffer has been allocated and has not yet been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Elimina il buffer grafico corrente, se un buffer è stato allocato e non è ancora stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: If the graphics buffer is in use, it will be marked for disposal as soon as it is free; otherwise, it will be disposed immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se il buffer di grafica è in uso, verrà contrassegnato per l'eliminazione non appena viene liberato; in caso contrario, sarà eliminato immediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la dimensione massima del buffer da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to get or set the maximum dimensions for a buffer that should be retained in memory.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di ottenere o impostare le dimensioni massime per un buffer che deve essere mantenuto in memoria.

trans-unit.source: You can allocate a buffer of any size, however any buffer with dimensions greater than the MaximumBuffer size will be used temporarily and then discarded when the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object is released.
trans-unit.target: È possibile allocare un buffer di qualsiasi dimensione, tuttavia i buffer con dimensioni maggiori di quelle MaximumBuffer saranno utilizzati temporaneamente ed eliminati quando il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> indicating the maximum size of the buffer dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> indicante la dimensione massima delle dimensioni del buffer.

trans-unit.source: The height or width of the size is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: L'altezza o la larghezza delle dimensioni è minore o uguale a zero.
